title: Eiffel Tower Visit
location: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris
notes: Book skip-the-line tickets in advance. Best views from Trocadéro for photos.

title: Louvre Museum Tour
notes: Pre-book timed entry tickets. Focus on highlights: Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo, Winged Victory.

title: Seine River Dinner Cruise
notes: Romantic evening cruise with 3-course dinner and panoramic city views.

title: Colosseum & Roman Forum
notes: Early morning visit to avoid crowds. Combo ticket includes Palatine Hill.

title: Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel
notes: Book guided tour for skip-the-line access. Photography not allowed in Sistine Chapel.

title: Trastevere Food Tour
notes: Walking food tour featuring authentic Roman cuisine and local wine tastings.

title: Sagrada Familia Visit
notes: Audio guide included. Tower access requires separate booking.

title: Park Güell Exploration
notes: Timed entry required. Best views of Barcelona from the main terrace.

title: Grand Palace & Wat Phra Kaew
location: Na Phra Lan Rd, Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Phra Nakhon, Bangkok
notes: Dress code strictly enforced. Avoid crowds by visiting early morning.

title: Floating Market Tour
notes: Early departure required. Traditional long-tail boat transportation included.

title: Cu Chi Tunnels Day Trip
location: Cu Chi District, Ho Chi Minh City
notes: Historical war tunnels tour with optional shooting range experience.

title: Mekong Delta Cruise
notes: Full-day river cruise with traditional lunch and local village visits.

title: Senso-ji Temple Visit
notes: Tokyo's oldest temple. Perfect for cherry blossom viewing in April.

title: Tsukiji Outer Market Food Tour
notes: Early morning sushi breakfast and fresh seafood tasting experience.

title: Shibuya & Harajuku Exploration
notes: Experience the famous Shibuya crossing and youth fashion culture.

title: Fushimi Inari Shrine Hike
notes: Famous thousand torii gates trail. Early morning visit for fewer crowds.

title: Traditional Tea Ceremony
notes: Authentic Japanese tea ceremony experience in historic geisha district.

title: Uluru Sunrise Viewing
notes: Sacred Aboriginal site. Spectacular sunrise colors over the monolith.

title: Kata Tjuta Valley of the Winds Walk
location: Kata Tjuta, Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park
notes: Moderate hiking trail with stunning rock formation views.

title: Northern Lights Chase
notes: Aurora hunting expedition with professional photography guidance.

title: Husky Sledding Adventure
notes: Traditional dog sledding experience through Arctic landscapes.

title: Santa Claus Village
notes: Official hometown of Santa Claus. Cross the Arctic Circle line.

title: Reindeer Farm Visit
notes: Meet Sami reindeer herders and learn about traditional Arctic life.

title: Medina Walking Tour
notes: Guided tour through the ancient walled city and bustling souks.

title: Sahara Desert Camel Trek
notes: Overnight desert camping with traditional Berber dinner under stars.

title: Skydiving over Queenstown
notes: Tandem skydive with spectacular views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables.

title: Milford Sound Cruise
notes: Full-day scenic cruise through stunning fjord with wildlife viewing.

title: Sky Tower & Harbor Bridge
notes: City's iconic landmarks with panoramic harbor views.

title: Waiheke Island Wine Tour
notes: Ferry trip to island paradise with boutique winery visits and tastings.

title: Manuel Antonio National Park
notes: Wildlife spotting and pristine beach visits in protected rainforest.

title: Monteverde Cloud Forest
notes: Zip-line canopy tour through mystical cloud forest ecosystem.

title: Machu Picchu Sunrise
notes: Early morning train to witness sunrise over the Lost City of the Incas.

title: Sacred Valley Tour
notes: Visit Pisac markets and Ollantaytambo fortress ruins.

title: Lake Louise Canoeing
notes: Paddle across the stunning turquoise glacial lake surrounded by peaks.

title: Icefields Parkway Drive
notes: Scenic drive through one of the world's most beautiful mountain highways.
